Legal Fiction.definition: something asssumed in law to be fact irrespective of the truth or accuracy of that assumption [the legal fiction that a day has no fractions " Fields v. Fairbanks North Star Borough
Legal Fiction.origin: [the legal fiction that a day has no fractions " Fields v. Fairbanks North Star Borough , 818 P.2d 658 (1991)"]
